DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter, prospective, observational study will evaluate the one-year outcomes in HBeAg positive chronic hepatitis B patients who had received Pegasys (peginterferon alfa-2a) in Arm A of study ML22265. Data will be collected from each patient for up to one year post-therapy.
DOC.brief_title: A Follow-Up Study of Patients With HBeAg Positive Chronic Hepatitis B Treated With Pegasys (Peginterferon Alfa-2a) in Study ML22265
DOC.criteria: Patients who were randomized to study Arm A of ML22265 and were treated and completed followup in the study, regardless of treatment response at any time point Patients unwilling to provide informed consent or abide by the requirements of the study
